text: Laura Pergolizzi (born March 18, 1981), known professionally as LP, is an American singer-songwriter and musician. LP has released seven albums and three EPs. LP has written songs for other artists including Rihanna, Christina Aguilera, the Backstreet Boys, Leona Lewis, Mylène Farmer, Cher Lloyd and Céline Dion. LP is openly a lesbian. ==References== ==Other websites== * * LP discography at Discogs Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American pop singers Category:American rock singers Category:American rock guitarists Category:American pop musicians Category:Singer-songwriters from New York (state) Category:Musicians from New York (state) Category:LGBT people from New York (state) Category:Lesbian feminists Category:LGBT singers Category:LGBT musicians
title: LP (singer)
